objectives: Understand the intuition behind CAP theorem and real-world tradeoffs
Explain CAP theorem and real-world tradeoffs with a simple metaphor
Apply CAP theorem and real-world tradeoffs to a practical engineering decision
misconceptions: CAP theorem and real-world tradeoffs has only one correct strategy
CAP theorem and real-world tradeoffs is purely theoretical and not practical
recap_message: CAP theorem and real-world tradeoffs: balance intuition, structure, and tradeoffs.
